event.title: November Happy Hour
event.description:
November Happy Hour  
Wednesday, November 11, 2015, 20:00, Hilton Barcelona Hotel, Avinguda Diagonal, 589-591   
Are you interested in networking in the English language community? Would you like to meet the ASB Board, find out what's going on in the English speaking community or get the latest information on all the new events the ASB is planning? Then come to our monthly Happy Hour. All are welcome! 
ASB Members: FREE ASB Friends: FREE 
Register to Win  
We'll have anther door prize this month and all you have to do to be eligible to win is: 
1) Register for the event by 16:00, November 11th and your name will automatically be added to the drawing. 
2) Show up - because if your name is drawn and you're not there, then you can't win!  
Win a Prize! 
How? Just register & show up. Yep, it's that easy. 
We look forward to seeing you there! 
  
The American Society of Barcelona www.amersoc.com 
tel: 93.368.4689  
     
__________________________________________________________________________  
Proud Partners with:
